product_name: Tune Belt Sport Armband for iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C - Pink
long_description: The comfortable neoprene Tune Belt Sport Armband envelops youriPhone 5, 5S, or 5C in bright pink reflective materials that enhance visibility and add a pop of color while securing it on your arm.
short_description: The comfortable neoprene Tune Belt Sport Armband envelops youriPhone 5, 5S, or 5C in bright pink reflective materials that enhance visibility and add a pop of color while securing it on your arm.
